## getUnscopedPackageName() function

Get un-scoped package name

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getUnscopedPackageName(name: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of the npm package |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

## Example

- '<!-- -->@<!-- -->loopback/context' =<!-- -->&gt; 'context' - 'express' =<!-- -->&gt; 'express'
